name: Unity Wars: The Arian Saga
description:
100 years after the Unity Wars, an incident between two powerful kingdoms escalate into a new civil war.  Thinking the legendary weapons can restore order once more, the heroes are killed by a new threat.  Can the remaining people unite once more to protect the last kingdom from falling?

Currently a Work In Progress demo with 9 playable stages and one bonus stage.  This sequel to the original Unity Wars offers more gameplay mechanics and more characters to assist you in your quest.  Branching story lines will be offered and more emphasis in strategy will be needed to survive.

Made using the SRPG Studio game engine.
